greeting:
👋 Hello! I'm Dayframe — your personal assistant. I can:
• 📅 Show tasks
• 📥 Save notes and files
• 🔍 Search the knowledge base
• 🕸️ Visualize your notes

Click the button or enter the command to start.

find.prompt: Enter a keyword, and I'll find it in your knowledge base.
find.error: ❌ Search error. Please try again later.

store.error: ❌ Could not save note. Please try later.
store.unsupported: ⚠️ I can only save plain text messages.

nextTask.noAll: ✅ All tasks for today are done or none exist.

timeLeft.note: (only tasks with start and end are counted)
timeLeft.error: ❌ Could not calculate free time. Please try again later.

errors.next: ❌ Could not determine the next task. Please try again later.
errors.today: ❌ Could not fetch today's tasks. Please try again later.
